segments.text: This is today ’ s schedule . At eight thirty , conference with the department managers . At 9 o ’ clock , live for the workshop where you ’ ll award prizes to the stafffor preventatives .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s great . What are the prizes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 3000 RIB as bonus for each person .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . Next thing is laying the corner-stone for the new plant at 10 AM . At 12 AM , back here for lunch .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At 2 PM , give a presentation here with the press . At four o ’ clock sharp , have dinner with Mr . Smith , manager of NCC .
segments.speaker: S1
